sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { UilTemperature, UilTear, UilWind, UilSun, UilSunset, } from "@iconscout/react-unicons"; import { formatToLocalTime, iconUrlFromCode } from "../services/WeatherService"; function TemperatureAndDetails({ weather: { details, icon, temp, temp_min, temp_max, speed, humidity, }, }) { return (

{details}

{`${temp.toFixed()}°`}

Humidity: {`${humidity.toFixed()}%`}
Wind: {`${speed.toFixed()} km/h`}
Wind Speed: {`${speed.toFixed()} km/h`}

High:{" "} {`${temp_max.toFixed()}°`}

|

Low:{" "} {`${temp_min.toFixed()}°`}

); } export default TemperatureAndDetails;
